description.value:
Mist fills the glass of this small circular hand mirror, creating strange patterns in the shifting gray wisps. The back of the mirror bears a flowing script engraving in an unknown language. The spell DC of any spell cast by activating this item is 30.

  • Armor After you cast an illusion spell by activating the mirror, choose one ally within 30 feet. That ally is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] as if seen in a misty mirror, until the end of your next turn.
  • Weapon After you cast an illusion spell by activating the mirror, illusory copies of the weapon swirl in the air around it. You're affected by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Thicket of Knives] spell until the end of your next turn. The spell ends if you stop wielding the affixed weapon.
